author: stsp
msg: Make svn proplist -R issue wc.db queries per directory instead of per node.
This will hopefully improve performance. I am anticipating to use a similar
approach for improving performance of other subcommands.
So when reviewing this change, please keep in mind that the proplist
implementation is intended to serve as a prototype.
If this approach turns out to have only marginal effect on performance,
we might have to try calling callbacks while an sqlite transaction is
running. In which case we might still need the code added in this commit
for backwards compatibility. See this thread for related discussion:
This does not yet change the way pristine props (svn proplist -rBASE) are
handled. This will be done in a later commit.
(svn_wc__prop_list_recursive): New. Calls newly added wc_db APIs as
properties of children of a node in the NODES and ACTUAL_NODES
(read_props_of_children): New. This function uses the newly added
wc.db queries to read all properties of children of a directory,
with the optional ability to ignore any children which aren't files.
(svn_client_proplist3): Use the new svn_wc__prop_list_recursive() API unless
